entry.title: KnowledgeFinder v1.0
entry.summary:
We are proud to announce the first open source version of KnowledgeFinder.

Source Code

The source code can be found on GitHub. It consist of four projects:

  • KnowledgeFinder-Core
  • KnowledgeFinder-Dataimport
  • KnowledgeFinder-Webservice
  • KnowledgeFinder-Theme

Documentation

The documentation can be found in the respective repository. The main documentation can be found in the core project.

How to start

Follow the installation instructions in the documentation. Therewith an example project will be installed, allowing you to experience KnowledgeFinder with some data.
